reviewText:
I love the old adventure movies takeing place in Africa (ex. Safari and more). this is a movie worth seeing and the Dvd is in a very good quality.

Greetings
Paul P. Denmark
This is a love story set amidst the African bush. It's more entertaining than expected with some beautiful scenery. Give it a shot ..

I highly recommend this adventure film.  It is beautifully filmed in Africa and Rhonda herself is breathtaking as always.  All the flavor of Africa as we knew it in the fifties is there and you see a hint of what was to come.
